W-Br: Thanks for checking on that. But… do you think we could wait to replace it for a little while? Q2 We’ve got a tight schedule here at the factory for the next couple of weeks – a lot of orders are being shipped out.
M-Au: The top layer of rubber is wearing thin in several places, so Q3 I think we'd better take care of it today. It shouldn't take long, though. Q3 I’m pretty sure I'll only need an hour to put a new belt on the machine.

M-Au: Right. Q3 And that’s why it would be better to contract the work out. I’ll call some painting companies right now for some price estimates.
